title: Academic Productivity Analysis and Strategy Development for Instructional Design and Technology (IDT) Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations in Educational Technology, Curriculum Development, and Research Methodology
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals (in healthcare, legal, or technical fields) with advanced domain expertise, studying in a collaborative environment that utilizes digital devices.

learning_goals: Compare and analyze academic productivity indicators (journal publications, handbook participation, award records) in the IDT field
Research curriculum trends of leading IDT programs and derive core attributes
Propose improvement strategies for the institution's IDT program based on analytical results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
